name: vanishlink
title: Vanishlink
description: Temporary link manager that vanishes links after inactivity
author: n_seiji

commands.name: add-from-clipboard
commands.title: Add from Clipboard
commands.description: Add a link from clipboard. If clipboard content is not a URL, show error message and exit. Title is fetched from website meta information.

commands.name: add
commands.title: Add Bookmark
commands.description: Add a bookmark by entering URL and title. Title is automatically fetched when URL is entered.

commands.name: open
commands.title: Open
commands.description: Search registered links by URL or title text matching, press enter to open in browser.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
